item.title: Ritualist Display Glitch
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
What happened?

When you play as ritualist, N1 you always start with 3 teleportation and 3 Brotherhoods, but if you use teleportation that night it will be 1 teleportation and 3 brotherhoods for N2.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Its supposed to display 2 Teleportation and 3 Brotherhoods for N1

Steps to reproduce:

  • Play as Ritualist
  • Look at N1, night results

Comments:

This is just a display glitch that happens N1 for ritualist. Although I know N1 that ritualist has 2 teleportation and 3 brotherhoods I would not think new players would know the difference.
